titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony and to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Authorizes Senator Grassley to testify at a deposition in Willey v. Riley, et al., except concerning matters for which a privilege should be asserted and authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent him.
